title: Most valuable Italian brands in 2019
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Brands.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is highest at Brand Eni and lowest at Brand Poste Italiane Spa.
There is a difference of 7591.0 between the maximum Brand Eni and minimum Brand Poste Italiane Spa.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars 10711.0 is found at Brand Eni and the minimum is found at Poste Italiane Spa where Brand is 3120.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Brands.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is highest at Brand Eni and lowest at Brand Poste Italiane Spa.
There is a difference of 7591.0 between the maximum Brand Eni and minimum Brand Poste Italiane Spa.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in each Brand on the y axis.
Brand Eni has the highest Brand value in million U.S. dollars and Poste Italiane Spa has the lowest Brand value in million U.S. dollars.
Second maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars is found at Brand Enel.
The difference of Brand value in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Brand is 7591.0.
Brand Eni is higher than any other Brands with value 10711.0, followed by Enel, and Gucci. Down to Brand Poste Italiane Spa with the lowest value 3120.0.
The highest value 10711.0 at Eni is almost 1.48 times larger than the average value 7232.7.
Summing up the values of all Brands, we get total 72327.0.
